        <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

g_form.hideAllFieldMsgs();

        if ((newValue.toString()) == (g_form.getValue('cmdb_ci_cage2'))){

            g_form.showFieldMsg('cmdb_ci_cage1', 'You must choose a different cage than the one you have already selected.', 'info');        
  
        }
        else {
        
        //    g_form.hideFieldMsg('cmdb_ci_cage2', false);
       
        }
}</script>
